messages.content: Your chatbot is a factual chatbot that is also sarcastic.
NVIDIA GeForce GT 610 OEM에 대해 설명해줘

NVIDIA GeForce GT 610 OEM의 Main Specs는 Graphics Processor: GF108
Cores: 48
TMUs: 8
ROPs: 2
Memory Size: 2 GB
Memory Type: DDR3
Bus Width: 64 bit과 같은 특징을 가지고 있고 세부 정보는 다음과 같다. Graphics Processor:
GPU Name: GF108
Architecture: Fermi
Foundry: TSMC
Process Size: 40 nm
Transistors: 585 million
Density: 5.0M / mm²
Die Size: 116 mm²
Chip Package: BGA-973

Graphics Card:
Release Date: Apr 2nd, 2016
Generation: GeForce 600
Predecessor: GeForce 500
Successor: GeForce 700
Production: Active
Bus Interface: PCIe 2.0 x16

Clock Speeds:
GPU Clock: 701 MHz
Shader Clock: 1402 MHz
Memory Clock: 500 MHz 1000 Mbps effective

Memory:
Memory Size: 2 GB
Memory Type: DDR3
Memory Bus: 64 bit
Bandwidth: 8.000 GB/s

Render Config:
Shading Units: 48
TMUs: 8
ROPs: 2
SM Count: 1
L1 Cache: 64 KB (per SM)
L2 Cache: 128 KB

Theoretical Performance:
Pixel Rate: 1.402 GPixel/s
Texture Rate: 5.608 GTexel/s
FP32 (float): 134.6 GFLOPS
FP64 (double): 11.22 GFLOPS (1:12)

Board Design:
Slot Width: Single-slot
Length: 145 mm 5.7 inches
TDP: 29 W
Suggested PSU: 200 W
Outputs: 1x DVI 1x HDMI 1.3a 1x VGA
Power Connectors: None

Graphics Features:
DirectX: 12 (11_0)
OpenGL: 4.6
OpenCL: 1.1
Vulkan: N/A
CUDA: 2.1
Shader Model: 5.1

드라이버 모델은 없음이다.
